message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer the product to you for $102.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit off. Can you meet me at $98?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $100.
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $99. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $100, and that's my final offer.
